thread.title: Albion web-chat - as it happened

title: Albion web-chat - as it happened
text:
PUBLISHED: October 22, 2015 8:58 am LAST UPDATED: October 22, 2015 4:06 pm Albion web-chat - as it happened Our new West Brom correspondent Matt Wilson was online for an hour today to answer your questions on the latest events at the Hawthorns. Matt Wilson Tweet 
Our man has got straight into the thick of things with Albion and loves a good debate with supporters about matters concerning the club. 
The Baggies will be looking to build on last weekend's Premier League win at home to Sunderland when they go to Norwich City on Saturday. More on this story:
